name: Nemo's Helper: A Juan & the Beanstalk adventure
name_original: Nemo's Helper: A Juan & the Beanstalk adventure
description:
Nemo's Helper: 8000 Feet  Above (and two mountain ranges from) The Sea  is a Juan & the Beanstalk adventure. It is made in Bitsy. This version still has a long way to go before it is a game. It is a very small world set in a fictional Colombia.

Nemo's Helper is made concurrently with the Unidos game jam and Rafael's  Visiting Artist gig at Anderson Ranch Arts Center in Snowmass Village, Colorado. 

Rafael Fajardo was born in Colombia and raised in San Antonio, Texas.
